COVID-19 Cases

by WHO Report

The WHO coronavirus (COVID-19) report presents the official daily counts of COVID-19 cases, deaths, and vaccine utilization documented by countries, territories, and areas from the year 2020 up to present.

Glimpse of Global COVID-19 Report

Overview of COVID-19 Cases in the Philippines

In Philippines, from 3 January, 2020 to 4:16pm CEST, 3 May, 2023, there have been 4,092,158 confirmed cases of COVID-19 with 66,444 deaths, reported to WHO. Moreover, last 8th of March 2023, a total of 170,690,206 vaccine doses have been administered.

Global COVID-19 Report Datasets

On this website, there are only a total of thirty (30) random countries reported here out of 197 countries worldwide. If you wish to see the overall report cases of COVID-19, feel free to click the button attached below.
